result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin J. Schmidt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Stalking [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.32(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  
*  Pay supervision fees.  
Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.  
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.   Domestic Violence Surcharge ($100  ea applicable count).   
*  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  
*  Submit to a DNA sample (unless previously provided) and pay surcharge.   
Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  May not have contact with Alcia Mendoza Schmidt with the exception through Family Wizard as long as agent can log in as well, unless otherwise permitted by the court.  Follow all compass recommendations.  Make monthly payments of court obligations & supervision fees.  Successfully complete DV treatment.

timeConds.notes: CONCURRENT with 14CF1089  -  Huber & work crew privileges authorized.   Credit for 107 days.

supervisions.notes:
Probation Revoked.
Any unpaid court obligations are still to be collected.
***6/1/16 - Amended JOC - 251 days credit for time served.****

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.  Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Do not be in taverns or on any premises licensed for the sale of intoxicating beverages, except restaurants or grocery stores.  Submit voluntarily to random tests of blood, breath or urine.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.
*   Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*   Submit a DNA sample unless previously provided.
*   Pay DNA surcharge unless previously paid.
Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  May not have contact with Alisha M but may utilize Family Wizard at the discretion of the Agent.

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney John Ward.  Clerk: PT
State is compliant with victim rights notification and statement given in court by victim.  Sentencing arguments made.    Sentence is withheld and DE is placed on probation for 2 years with conditions.   See conditions.  As a condition court imposes 6 months in the KCJ forthwith.  Huber & Work Crew authorized.  Credit for 107 days.   Cash Bond on deposit in 14CF718, 14CF1089 and 14CM889 to be applied and any unpaid financial obligations that remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  No contact with Alicia M. S. with the exception through Family Wizard as long as agent is able to log in and monitor as well.  Appeal Rights, Firearm Warning & Voting Acknowledgement given.  Files 14CM889, 15CF159, 15CF367 and 15CF368 are read in.
